description: Jayson decided to pop his cherry right here on boys first time. He figured the name was perfect. He was always the one to pitch and never the one to catch but all of that changed. He brought a friend along he could trust. I guess you could say theyre bed buddies. He was a little nervous and tense but there is nothing like some good man boy loving to calm you right down. He eventually took it like a champ and now he cant wait to catch again.
title: Ass Passion
